channel.title: Equilibrium aura
channel.description: Hey guys, I felt like I should tell you about this awesome aura which nobody really knows about. "This aura causes your successful hits in combat to have your maximum hit reduced by 25%, but also have your minimum hit increased by the same amount. It does not affect the rate at which you successfully hit. It does NOT mean that you will never hit a zero. This aura could [b]prove[/b] to be useful on [b]Nex[/b] because all hits are capped at 500 on Nex. So if the players max hit is over 500 then Equilibrium would actually increase their average damage on Nex because most of the damage being added to their minimum hit from their max hit would have been over 500 and otherwise wasted on Nex." Source: http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Equilibrium Just felt people should know this considering this aura has great potential and could be amazing for pking(some auras work in pking situations i.e. vampyrism), it can be used to change the polypore spells similar to storm of arma(about 10%-15% worse but 20x'ish times cheaper). Aura lasts for 2hrs and recharge time of 4 hours which is a nice last time, offer 17.5k atm special offer as its tier 2. Discuss(:? I think its amazing, going to polypore fight kiln when I get refund on points from Jagex

2hours then a 4 hour recharge I think, the right time is the OP.

Still waiting on Jagex to refund my points… >.<! Me want that auraaa so bad :C

item.title: Equilibrium aura
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Hey guys,
I felt like I should tell you about this awesome aura which nobody really knows about.
“This aura causes your successful hits in combat to have your maximum hit reduced by 25%, but also have your minimum hit increased by the same amount. It does not affect the rate at which you successfully hit. It does NOT mean that you will never hit a zero.
This aura could prove to be useful on Nex because all hits are capped at 500 on Nex. So if the players max hit is over 500 then Equilibrium would actually increase their average damage on Nex because most of the damage being added to their minimum hit from their max hit would have been over 500 and otherwise wasted on Nex.” Source: http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Equilibrium
Just felt people should know this considering this aura has great potential and could be amazing for pking(some auras work in pking situations i.e. vampyrism), it can be used to change the polypore spells similar to storm of arma(about 10%-15% worse but 20x’ish times cheaper).
Aura lasts for 2hrs and recharge time of 4 hours which is a nice last time, offer 17.5k atm special offer as its tier 2.
Discuss(:? I think its amazing, going to polypore fight kiln when I get refund on points from Jagex
